price: Bemeramana! Aho hambere yanyu, harabaye imigwi y’abantu, abemera muri bo barageragejwe mu kuneshwa igihe bahanganye n’abagarariji, ariko impera n’imperuka bakabatsinda. Kubera ivyo rero, nimugendagende kw’isi mwibuka ivyo, maze mwirabire ivyashikiye abahakanye Imana Allah n’Intumwa zayo [75].
arabic: قَدۡ خَلَتۡ مِن قَبۡلِكُمۡ سُنَنٞ فَسِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَٱنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
footnotes: [75] Muri iyi Aayah Imana Allah Irahoza abemeramana ku vyabashikiye ku rugamba rwa Uhudi, ko batocika intege kuko impera n’imperuka ni bo benintsinzi.

meta.transliteration: qad khalat min qablikum sunanun fasīrū fī al-arḍi fa-unẓurū kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu al-mukadhibīna
